content.rendered:
Next weekend some members of team Piklist will in Miami attending WordCamp. If you’re in the neighborhood we would love to meet you.

We will not be presenting, but we’ll be around to discuss Piklist (and anything else you want to chat about).

If you’re attending WordCamp Miami next weekend and want to meet up, email us at support@piklist.com or send us a tweet, @piklist.

Looking forward to meeting you.
